def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = [int(input()) for _ in range(n)]
    print(a)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

def main():
    a = input()
    print(a)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


a, b = map(int, input().split())
print(a * b - a - b + 1)
#!/usr/bin/env python3

a,b = map(int,input().split())
print(a*b-a-b+1)

a, b = map(int, input().split())
print(a * b - (a + b) + 1)


def main():
    c, d, e = map(int, input().split())
    print(c, d, e)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

def main():
    a, b = map(int, input().split())
    print(a * b - (a + b) + 1)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


def main():
    a, b = map(int, input().split())  #map(function, iterable, ...)
    print(a * b - (a + b) + 1)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


def main():
    a, b = map(int, input().split())
    print(a * b - (a + b) + 1

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
import sys
sys.setrecursionlimit(10**6)

a,b = map(int,input().split())
print(a*b-a-b+1,end="")

a, b = map(int, input().split())
print(a * b - a - b + 1)
a,b = map(int,input().split())
print(a*b-a-b+1)


a,b = map(int,input().split()) # split the input and map to integers
print(a*b-a-b+1)


a,b = map(int,input().split())
print(a*b-a-b+1)
